episodes.title: Life after | 6
episodes.description: Living in fear of a beating, Joe grew up in the cult known as The Children of God. He and his siblings were heavily disciplined, sexually abused and forced to busk on the streets for money to buy food. Joe is still healing from his childhood, but his ability to find beauty in the everyday has provided a path to recovery To read more about this podcast and see the documentary visit prayedupon.com.au You can binge all six episodes of Prayed Upon ad-free today and get access to bonus content by subscribing to Crime X+ on Apple Podcasts See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Stolen childhoods | 5
episodes.description: They were robbed of their innocence inside one of the world's worst cults. Alisha and Amy grew up in the Children of God, where they lived in communes in Australia and overseas. They were beaten, abused and denied access to the outside world. Years later, they are still traumatised by what happened and now want the perpetrators brought to justice To read more about this podcast and see the documentary visit prayedupon.com.au You can binge all six episodes of Prayed Upon ad-free today and get access to bonus content by subscribing to Crime X+ on Apple Podcasts See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Online satanic cult groups tricked Aussie teen playing Roblox on Discord | Documentary
episodes.description:
Online satanic cult groups tricked Aussie teen playing Roblox on Discord | Documentary

#documentary #breakingnews  #investigation 

An Australian mother has revealed how her daughter was the victim of a violent online cult with satanic and neo-Nazi links in the dark web.

For 10 months a sinister online cult convinced an Australian teenager to share sexually-explicit images of herself and carve their leader’s name into her body, with their abuse culminating with an order to kill the family cat. When she refused, revenge was swift.

The  FBI put out a public service announcement in September 2023 warning of violent online groups including 764, 676, CVLT, Court, Kaskar, Harm Nation, Leak Society, and H3ll. At least five alleged members have been charged or jailed.

One of them is baby-faced Baby-faced 764 cult leader Bradley Cadenhead, who is just 17. Cadenhead from Texas was sentenced to 80 years in prison after pleading guilty to nine counts including possessing and promoting child pornography.

episodes.title: Prayed Upon - a  special investigation into Australian cults
episodes.description:
This gripping documentary by The Sunday Mail lifts the lid on the shocking and secretive Australian cult, the Anglican Catholic Mission Community. Go on the road with investigative journalists Kate Kyriacou and Greg Stolz as they uncover the controlling way of life and strict rules members must live under.

#documentary #cult #queensland

episodes.title: Escaping the tribe | 4
episodes.description: Matthew Klein’s baby would have died if he had listened to leaders of a cult he joined, who suggested he could pray rather than seek medical help. Matthew knew he had to get out, but his wife wanted to stay. It tore his family apart To read more about this podcast and see the documentary visit prayedupon.com.au You can binge all six episodes of Prayed Upon ad-free today and get access to bonus content by subscribing to Crime X+ on Apple Podcasts See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Cult brides | 3
episodes.description: If you've spent your life in extreme religious groups, life outside is bewildering. When Claire Ashman escaped the cult The Order of St Charbel with her eight children she had no idea about popular movies or TV, how to use an ATM or open a bank account. But she was free for the first time in her life. To read more about this podcast and see the documentary visit prayedupon.com.au You can binge all six episodes of Prayed Upon ad-free today and get access to bonus content by subscribing to Crime X+ on Apple Podcasts See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Doomsday prophets | 2
episodes.description: What do you do if your friend or family member joins a cult? You call Raphael Aron. He has been rescuing people from these extreme, controlling groups for more than 40 years. Since Covid, he's busier than ever and warns the modern cult leader is not what you would expect To read more about this podcast and see the documentary visit prayedupon.com.au You can binge the first five episodes of Prayed Upon today by subscribing to Crime X+ on Apple Podcasts See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Stay, Pray, Obey | 1
episodes.description: Why do people start cults? Why do people join them? And most importantly - how do they escape? Investigative journalists Kate Kyricou and Greg Stolz lift the lid on a secretive Australian cult that dictates the lives of its members with bizarre and strict rules and they reveal harrowing stories of those who have escaped.  Prayed Upon is available early and ad-free on Crime X+ and the News Corp Masthead Apps today.  This is Part 1 of Prayed Upon. Part 2 drops in January, with five more episodes.See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
